titles.title: Helping Families Save for Education Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand access to Coverdell education savings accounts.
Helping Families Save for Education Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Helping Families Save for Education Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to Coverdell education savings accounts, to: (1) increase the age limit for beneficiaries of such accounts after which contributions may not be made from age 18 to age 22, and (2) increase the maximum contribution limit in any taxable year from $2,000 to $10,000.
